FORT GORDON GROWTH MANAGEMENT PLAN
MONTGOMERY COUNTY MILITARY INSTALLATION COORDINATOR

THE GRANT SUSTAINS AND ENHANCES THE OPERATIONAL EFFECTIVENESS, RESILIENCY, AND SUSTAINABILITY OF THE PORT, WHICH IS VITAL TO ENSURING GUAM'S GEOGRAPHIC STRATEGIC IMPORTANCE TO THE UNITED STATES. A MAJOR AND TANGIBLE BENEFIT IS THE GRANT ENABLES THE PORT AUTHORITY OF GUAM TO INCREASE THE CARGO THROUGH PUT THAT IS CRITICAL TO THE RELOCATION OF THE MARINES FROM JAPAN TO GUAM AND SUSTAINING THE CRITICAL LEGACY MISSIONS. OVER NINETY PERCENT OF ALL GOODS ORGANIC ISLAND GROWTH AND MILITARY REQUIREMENTS ARRIVE ON ISLAND VIA THE PORT OF GUAM. IN ADDITION, THE PORT OF GUAM IS THE TRANSSHIPMENT PORT FOR ALL THE SURROUNDING ISLANDS INCLUSIVE OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF THE NORTHERN MARIANA ISLANDS CNMI. THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE HAVE TWO MAJOR PROGRAMS PROPOSED FOR THE CNMI, THUS ENSURING THE PORT OF GUAM IS A VIABLE TRANSSHIPMENT PORT IS PARAMOUNT TO THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE. THE GRANT ENABLES THE PORT AUTHORITY OF GUAM TO ENSURE THE CAPITAL IMPROVEMENT PROJECTS ARE ALIGNED, PLANNED, DESIGNED, AND CONSTRUCTED AS SOUND INVESTMENTS THAT PROACTIVELY TAKE INTO ACCOUNT THE EVOLVING CARGO TRANSSHIPMENT DEMANDS AND CHANGES IN TECHNOLOGY. IN ADDITION, THE GRANT SUPPORTS SEVERAL FEASIBILITY STUDIES I.E. CUSTOMS INSPECTION FEASIBILITY STUDY, DEEP DRAFT WHARF AND FILL IMPROVEMENTS PROJECT FEASIBILITY STUDY, ETC., WHICH WILL ENABLE THE PORT AUTHORITY OF GUAM TO DETERMINE THE APPROPRIATE TIMING AND FUNDING MECHANISM TO ENSURE THE PORT'S OPERATIONAL RESILIENCY AND RESPONSIVENESS. THE NUMBER, TYPE, AND VARIETY OF DOD INITIATIVES UNDERSCORE GUAM'S STRATEGIC AND TACTICAL VALUE TO THE DOD AND TO THE NATION ESPECIALLY IN REGARDS TO THE NATIONAL DEFENSE STRATEGY. THE ISLAND OF GUAM IS OFTEN REFERRED TO AS THE TIP OF THE SPEAR IN THE WESTERN PACIFIC. THE VIABILITY OF THE PORT IS PARAMOUNT TO SUSTAINING THE MILITARY'S OPERATIONAL EFFECTIVENESS AND MISSION READINESS IN THE WESTERN PACIFIC THEATER OF OPERATIONS, IN AN EVER EVOLVING, DYNAMIC, AND CHALLENGING GEOPOLITICAL ENVIRONMENT.

IN RESPONSE TO THE UNPRECEDENTED NATURE, MAGNITUDE, EVOLVING, AND PROTRACTED DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE REALIGNMENT ACTIONS PROPOSED FOR THE ISLAND OF GUAM THAT ARE PARAMOUNT TO DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE READINESS AND OPERATIONS IN THE WESTERN PACIFIC THEATER OF OPERATIONS, THE GRANT ENHANCES THE OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR ABILITY TO SERVE MORE EFFECTIVELY AS THE CENTRAL CLEARINGHOUSE ON ALL FEDERAL ACTIONS THAT ARE RELATED TO THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE REALIGNMENTS AND BUILDUP ON GUAM. IN ADDITION, THE GRANT ENABLES THE GOVERNMENT OF GUAM TO PURSUE A WHOLE OF GOVERNMENT APPROACH THAT LEVERAGES LIMITED AND OR SCARCE RESOURCES TO MITIGATE IMPACTS ASSOCIATED WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE PROGRAMS, FOR THE BENEFIT OF ALL STAKEHOLDERS, INCLUSIVE OF THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE. THE OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR AND THE GOVERNMENT OF GUAMS RESPONSIVENESS DIRECTLY ENHANCES THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE OPERATIONS AND READINESS, WHICH ENSURES GUAMS STRATEGIC VALUE TO THE NATION IS

IN RESPONSE TO THE UNPRECEDENTED NATURE, MAGNITUDE, EVOLVING, AND PROTRACTED DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE REALIGNMENT ACTIONS FOR THE ISLAND OF GUAM THAT ARE PARAMOUNT TO DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE READINESS AND OPERATIONS IN THE WESTERN PACIFIC THEATER OF OPERATIONS, THE PROGRAM OF ASSISTANCE ENABLES THE GOVERNMENT OF GUAM TO CONDUCT AND PRODUCE A GOVERNMENT OF GUAM FINANCIAL IMPACT ASSESSMENT STUDY UPDATE THAT INFORMS AND ENHANCES THE GOVERNMENT OF GUAMS ABILITY TO STRATEGICALLY FOCUS AND LEVERAGE LIMITED AND OR SCARCE RESOURCES TO MITIGATE IMPACTS ASSOCIATED WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE PROGRAMS. UNDERSTANDING THE FINANCIAL ASSUMPTIONS AND FINDINGS IN THE GOVERNMENT OF GUAM 2009 AND 2010 FINANCIAL AND FISCAL STUDIES AND REPORTS, DEVELOPED DURING THE PLANNING PHASE OF THE PROGRAM, AND ASSESSING THE FINANCIAL ASSUMPTIONS AND FINDINGS AGAINST THE CURRENT CONDITIONS IMPLEMENTATION PHASE COUPLED WITH RECENT CONTEXTUAL EVENTS RECENT FEDERAL TAX CODE CHANGES, RECENT FEDERAL IMMIGRATION POLICIES AND THEIR IMPACTS ON THE APPLICATION OR USE OF H2B FOREIGN WORKERS ON GUAM, ETC WILL INFORM AND ENHANCE THE GOVERNMENT OF GUAMS ABILITY TO MORE EFFECTIVELY AND STRATEGICALLY FOCUS AND LEVERAGE SCARCE RESOURCES, WHICH LEAD TO SIGNIFICANT AND TANGIBLE OUTCOMES FOR ALL STAKEHOLDERS INCLUSIVE OF THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE. STABLE FINANCIAL CONDITIONS ARE CRITICAL TO SUSTAINING GUAMS STRATEGIC AND OPERATIONAL VALUE TO THE NATION.
WHICH LEAD TO SIGNIFICANT AND TANGIBLE OUTCOMES FOR ALL STAKEHOLDERS INCLUSIVE OF THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE. THIS IS VITAL TO SUSTAINING GUAMS STRATEGIC AND OPERATIONAL VALUE TO THE NATION.

THE GRANTS ENABLE THE OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR TO SERVE AS THE CENTRAL CLEARINGHOUSE ON ALL FEDERAL ACTIONS THAT ARE RELATED TO THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE REALIGNMENTS AND BUILDUP ON THE ISLAND OF GUAM. THE OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR RESPONSIVENESS ENHANCES THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE OPERATIONS AND READINESS, WHICH ENSURES GUAMS STRATEGIC VALUE TO THE NATION IS SUSTAINED. THE GRANT ENSURES THE ISLAND EQUITIES ARE REPRESENTED WHILE ENSURING THE GOVERNMENT OF GUAM IS RESPONSIVE TO THE HIGHLY DYNAMIC, CHALLENGING, AND PIVOTAL DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE PROGRAM. THE GRANT ENABLES THE GOVERNOR OF GUAM TO SUSTAIN THE OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR BUILDUP OFFICE.
LUKE AIR FORCE BASE TARGETED GROWTH MANAGEMENT PLAN
WALTER REED NATIONAL MILITARY MEDICAL CENTER, BETHESDA
OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR LOGISTICAL SUPPORT
PORT AUTHORITY OF GUAM TRANSITION / SUSTAINMENT
